name: Homebound (itch) (laisenjam)
description:
Maybe this road trip with Mama and Baba wouldn't be that bad! Baba's being cryptic again and you don't really know where you're going but at least you're going in with your trusty 2S Lite. 

A short piece of interactive fiction where your parents take you on a trip on the last day of summer.

Made for the #icantwrite game jam.

Presented by Laisenjam!
